metrics.name: gov_local
metrics.label: GOV Local
metrics.description: The sum of checkout price including all fees. This only accounts rentals with 'payment_status' = 'success' and 'reservation_status' = 'valid'

metrics.name: remittable_fee_revenue_local
metrics.label: Remittable Fee Revenue Local
metrics.description: The sum of fees collected that are included in the Display Price. This only accounts rentals with 'payment_status' = 'success' and 'reservation_status' = 'valid'.  Note: This metric is included within the GMV metric. If this is selected alongside GMV  you will be double counting revenue.

metrics.name: rental_remit_local
metrics.label: Rental Remit Local
metrics.description: The total value remitted to the operator from valid rentals.

metrics.name: rentals_sold
metrics.label: Rentals Sold
metrics.description: Count of rentals created where payment status is 'success' and reservation status is 'valid'.

metrics.name: rentals_ending
metrics.label: Rentals Ending
metrics.description: Count of rentals ending where payment status is 'success' and reservation status is 'valid'.

metrics.name: rentals_starting
metrics.label: Rentals Starting
metrics.description: Count of rentals starting where payment status is 'success' and reservation status is 'valid'.

metrics.name: facilities_with_rentals_sold
metrics.label: Facilities With Rental Sold
metrics.description: Distinct count of facilities with a rental sold where payment status is 'success' and reservation status is 'valid'.

metrics.name: facilities_with_rentals_ending
metrics.label: Facilities With Rentals Ending
metrics.description: Distinct count of facilities with rentals ending where payment status is 'success' and reservation status is 'valid'.

metrics.name: facilities_with_rentals_starting
metrics.label: Facilities With Rentals Starting
metrics.description: Distinct count of facilities with rentals starting where payment status is 'success' and reservation status is 'valid'.

metrics.name: renters_with_rentals_purchased
metrics.label: Renters With A Purchase
metrics.description: Distinct count of renters with a purchase where payment status is 'success' and reservation status is 'valid'.

metrics.name: renters_with_rentals_ending
metrics.label: Renters With Rentals Ending
metrics.description: Distinct count of renters with rentals ending where payment status is 'success' and reservation status is 'valid'.

metrics.name: renters_with_rentals_starting
metrics.label: Renters With Rentals Starting
metrics.description: Distinct count of renters with rentals starting where payment status is 'success' and reservation status is 'valid'.
